topComments.author: JT Blanco
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O parque em geral √© decente para crian√ßas menores de 12 anos. O maior problema √© que os passeios precisam de melhor manuten√ß√£o, pois o equipamento quebra com frequ√™ncia. Sugiro √°reas mais cobertas para que as pessoas possam ficar na sombra durante os dias quentes de ver√£o. Os pre√ßos s√£o justos e dentro do fliperama √© um bom lugar para se refrescar quando est√° calor l√° fora. Sugiro visitar √† noite durante o ver√£o.  (Original) The park in general is decent for kids under 12. The biggest issue is that the rides need better maintenance as the equipment breaks often. I suggest more covered areas so people can stay in the shade during hot summer days. Prices are fair and inside the arcade is a good place to cool off when is hot outside. I suggest to visit at night during the summer.

topComments.author: Elizabeth Simonsen
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Levei meu filho aqui com meu marido e eles se divertiram muito! Estou esperando, ent√£o n√£o pude fazer muito, mas me diverti vendo eles curtirem o parque. Lexi levou meu filho em sua primeira viagem de trem e ela foi muito gentil com ele quando terminamos. Ele √© autista e adora trens, ent√£o essa foi a principal raz√£o pela qual viemos. Mas acabamos comprando pulseiras e fazendo muito mais. Cada membro da equipe que encontramos foi muito gentil conosco e nos sentimos muito bem-vindos. Obrigado por nos atender! Com certeza voltarei em breve!  (Original) Took my son here with my husband and they had a blast! I‚Äôm expecting so I couldn‚Äôt do much, but I had fun watching them enjoy the park. Lexi took my son on his first train ride and she was very sweet with him when we got done. He is autistic and loves trains so, that was the main reason why we came. But we ended up buying wrist bands and doing much more. Every staff member we came across was very sweet to us and we felt very welcomed. Thank you for accommodating us! Will definitely be back soon!

topComments.author: Marlena Shaw
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A jovem de 17 anos n√£o queria ir, mas foi ela quem mais se divertiu. Todos os meus 4 filhos gostaram. Eu me diverti tamb√©m. N√£o estava lotado. A equipe foi agrad√°vel ao redor. Pretendemos ir novamente!  (Original) The 17 year old didn't want to go but she had the most fun. All of my 4 kids enjoyed it. I had fun too. It wasn't crowded. The staff was nice all around. We plan to go again!

topComments.author: Simon Davis
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Seria bom se eles tivessem um passe de jogo ilimitado que voc√™ pudesse comprar. √â pay-as-you-go e vai r√°pido. Todo mundo foi muito legal e as crian√ßas que levamos adoraram, exceto minha carteira  (Original) It would be nice if they had an unlimited game pass that you could buy. It is pay-as-you-go and it goes quick. Everyone was very nice and the kids we took loved it except for my wallet

topComments.author: Jackie Stills
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Parque estava limpo. Alguns passeios ca√≠ram. (3 ou 4 passeios para baixo) gostaria de v√™-los em funcionamento. Linhas n√£o era muito ruim. Tivemos um problema, mas foi rapidamente corrigido pela GM. E agradecemos por isso dar 5 estrelas e vamos voltar.  (Original) Park was clean. Some rides were down. (3 or 4 rides down) would have like to see them up and running. Lines was not too bad. We had an issue but was quickly fix by GM. And we appreciate that so giving 5 stars and we'll return.

topComments.author: Jennie Miller
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A equipe foi muito simp√°tica considerando que havia v√°rios grupos escolares l√° hoje. laser tag mesmo que fosse com um monte de crian√ßas menores da 1¬™ √† 3¬™ s√©rie, mas eu ainda me diverti com eles. Se voc√™ est√° procurando algo divertido para fazer com a fam√≠lia, sugiro que v√°. N√£o √© Busch Gardens ou Disney, mas esperamos apenas 5 ou 10 minutos para um passeio .... quando chegamos um pouco quente, fomos para o fliperama para esfriar ..... eu me diverti!!!  (Original) The staff was very friendly considering there was several school groups there today....the rides we good...Rollercoaster not my fav that's just because I'm older....everything else was pretty fun....I enjoyed laser tag even tho it was with a bunch of smaller kids 1st-3rd graders but I still had fun with them. If you are looking for something fun to do with the fam I suggest you go. It is not Busch gardens or Disney but we only waited 5 or 10 minutes for a ride....when we got a little warm we went to the arcade to cool down.....I had fun!!!

topComments.author: Erika Stewart
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) N√≥s tivemos um tempo incr√≠vel. Existem kart para todas as idades, desde crian√ßas a adultos. Muitas coisas para fazer, passamos uma tarde inteira e nem fizemos tudo o que eles tinham para oferecer. N√≥s realmente gostamos do golfe em miniatura, lazer tag, go carts, parede de escalada, pedalinhos, gaiolas de batedura, curso de corda de ar, passeio 4D indoor (vale cada centavo !! Minha parte favorita) h√° tamb√©m um fliperama de tamanho decente, as crian√ßas brincaram l√° por um tempo, mas honestamente, com todas as outras atividades, eles n√£o gastaram muito tempo nessa parte. A melhor parte ... tudo estava inclu√≠do na pulseira, exceto o passeio 4D e o fliperama ... voc√™ poderia fazer todas as outras coisas quantas vezes quisesse. Todas as linhas se moveram muito rapidamente.  (Original) We had an amazing time. There are go cart suitable for all ages from young children to adults. Many things to do, we spent an entire afternoon and didn‚Äôt even do everything they had to offer. We really enjoyed the miniature golf, lazer tag, go carts, rock climbing wall, peddle boats, batting cages, air rope course, 4D indoor ride (worth every penny!! My personal favorite part) there is also a pretty decent sized arcade, the kids played in there for a while but honestly with all the other activities they didn‚Äôt spend as much time in that part. The best part‚Ä¶ everything was included in the wristband except the 4D ride and the arcade‚Ä¶ you could do all the other things as often as you would like. All lines moved very quickly.

topComments.author: mayra rosado
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Teve uma explos√£o absoluta! Jogos incr√≠veis, EXTREMAMENTE amig√°vel para crian√ßas, a equipe foi muito educada e a padaria colombiana l√° √© uma vantagem definitiva! Vai de novoüòÅ  (Original) Had an absolute blast! Amazing games, EXTREMELY kid friendly, staff was very polite and the Columbian bakery in there is a definite plus! Will be going againüòÅ

topComments.author: Marrisa Caborn
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Andretti Thrill Park √© um √≥timo lugar para desfrutar de v√°rias aventuras!!!!!! Recentemente levei minha filha l√° para seu anivers√°rio de 12 anos e direi que ela e uma amiga se divertiram muito! Desde os passeios de Bumper Boat at√© 2 pistas diferentes de Go Cart, existem v√°rias maneiras de realizar os sonhos de aventura de corrida. V√°rios passeios tipo carnaval com certeza v√£o virar o est√¥mago! Um mini campo de golfe e muito espa√ßo ao ar livre fechado deixa as crian√ßas GO! N√£o vamos esquecer de mencionar o Arcade dentro da Andretti. Muitos jogos e devo acrescentar que todos t√™m a capacidade de sacar pr√™mios dos ganhos do jogo! Depois que voc√™ e os pequenos trabalharem e abrirem o apetite, o Parque teve uma concess√£o no local com uma variedade de lanches e itens de menu para crian√ßas para satisfazer o paladar. Andretti Thrill Park em Palm Bay, Fl√≥rida √© uma classifica√ß√£o de 5 estrelas para mim e minha fam√≠lia! Eu gostaria de acrescentar que este parque de aventura foi um √≥timo lugar para uma festa com or√ßamento limitado e tem MUITAS ofertas de grupo, bem como promo√ß√µes para atender a todos os pre√ßos acess√≠veis. Obrigado √† equipe da Andretti, pois eles est√£o prontos para informar da minha agenda todas as suas d√∫vidas e preocupa√ß√µes! Agradecimentos especiais a Merrisa e Takeina, desculpe se escrevi seus nomes errados. Estas 2 senhoras no balc√£o de admiss√£o foram muito informadas e amig√°veis. Eu definitivamente recomendo este parque para fam√≠lias de todas as idades. Atenciosamente, Marisa  (Original) Andretti Thrill Park is a great place to enjoy multiple adventures!!!!!! Recently took my daughter there for her 12th birthday and I will say her and a friend had a BLAST! From the Bumper Boat rides to 2 different Go Cart tracks there are multiple ways to fulfill ones racing adventure dreams. Several carnival type rides sure to turn ones stomach! A mini Golf course and  plenty  of closed outdoor space let the kids GO! Let's not forget to mention the Arcade inside of Andretti. Lots of games and might I add all have the ability to cash out in prizes from the game winnings! After you and the kiddos work up and appetite the Park had a concession on site with a variety of snacks and kid friendly menu item to satisfy ones taste buds. Andretti Thrill Park in Palm Bay, Fl is a 5 star rating for me and my family!! I would like to add this adventure park was a great place for a party on a budget and have MANY group deals as well as promotions to fit every ones affordability. Thank you to the staff of Andretti as they are ready to inform of my schedule all your questions and concerns! Special thanks to Merrisa and Takeina, sorry if I spell your names wrong. These 2 ladies at the admission counter were very informed and friendly. I definitely recommend this Park to families of all ages. Sincerely, Marrisa

topComments.author: Joyce Erickson
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Acabei de comemorar o 12¬∫ anivers√°rio da minha filha. Da gerente de vendas da festa - Daniela, coordenadora da festa - Ashley e o gerente (que foi extremamente prestativo e admir√°vel), apesar da falta de pessoal e de alguns contratempos, ele tratou nossas preocupa√ß√µes de forma eficiente e profissional. Altamente recomendado para festas e eventos!  (Original) Just celebrated my daughter‚Äôs 12th birthday. From the party sales manager - Daniela, party coordinator - Ashley and the Manager (who was extremely helpful and admirable), despite short staff and some mishap he handled our concerns very efficient and professional. Highly recommended for parties and events!

topComments.author: Alex Melo
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ame este lugar se voc√™ adora gocarts, videogames de ponta, laser tag e covid safe. David, Andre e a equipe usavam m√°scara e higienizavam ambientes internos e externos. A equipe foi √∫til com todas as perguntas que t√≠nhamos estando l√° pela primeira vez. Amo as pulseiras de passeio ilimitadas, √≥tima experi√™ncia incr√≠vel. E para todos os jogadores nost√°lgicos, eles tinham uma mesa de jogo de h√≥quei √† moda antiga. Seu sistema de jogo VR de ponta era incr√≠vel. A arena de laser tag era grande e divertida. Estaremos visitando novamente.  A.Melo Fot√≥grafo nacional medalhista de ouro e artista internacional premiado.  (Original) Love this place if you love gocarts, high end video games, laser tag , and covid safe. David, Andre, and the staff were all wearing mask and they were sanitizing indoors and outdoors.  The staff was helpful with all the questions we had being there the first time. Love the whole unlimited ride wristbands, great amazing experience. And for all the nostalgia gamers they had old school pac man by air hockey table. Their high end VR game system was amazing. The laser tag arena was big and fun. We will be visiting again.  A.Melo National Gold Medalist Photographer and International award winning artist.

topComments.author: Emery Kennedy
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Experi√™ncia horr√≠vel, pessoal todos os seus telefones celulares e n√£o prestando aten√ß√£o. Dirigiu os carrinhos el√©tricos muito devagar. O membro da equipe perguntou como estava, eu disse horr√≠vel e muito lento e ela me chamou de rainha üò§ Eu disse que se voc√™ n√£o sabe a verdade, n√£o pergunte. Putt Putt foi um coll criado, mas n√£o foi limpo em algum tempo. Devia ter tirado fotos melhores  (Original) Horrible experience,  staff all of their cell phones and not paying attention.  Drove mee electric carts very slow. Staff member asked how ir was, I said horrible and very slow amd she called me a queen üò§  I  said if you don't the truth,  don't ask. topComments.author: Derek Wells
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar √© incr√≠vel para um parque de emo√ß√£o na √°rea! Tivemos o passe de um dia inteiro e conseguimos fazer quase tudo em 6 horas. Com o passe para o dia todo voc√™ pode fazer quase tudo "de gra√ßa". O arcade, √© claro, custa dinheiro. O VR foi de 7 por pessoa. Mas todo o resto estava inclu√≠do principalmente no passe de um dia inteiro. A √∫ltima vez que estivemos l√° havia algumas atra√ß√µes que n√£o estavam l√°. Parece que eles est√£o se expandindo, o que √© incr√≠vel. A equipe foi incr√≠vel e todos tiveram uma atitude positiva. Bom trabalho!  (Original) This place is awesome for a thrill park in the area! We had the all day pass and was able to do almost everything within 6 hours.  With the all day pass you can almost do everything for "free".  The arcade, of course, cost money.  The VR was 7 per person. But everything else was mainly included in the all day pass.  The last time we were there there were some attractions that were not there.  Seems like they are expanding, which is awesome.  The staff was awesome and everyone had a positive attitude.  Good job!

topComments.author: Paul Carroll
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Trouxe minha fam√≠lia para c√° e foi uma experi√™ncia positiva. Meus filhos t√™m 16, 11 e 6 anos. Todos eles se divertiram muito e v√£o querer voltar. Um funcion√°rio em particular realmente me impressionou com a forma como ele engajou as crian√ßas em gocarts. Ele aproveitou o tempo para falar com outras crian√ßas (que n√£o fazem parte do meu grupo) sobre as regras da pista e o fez de maneira calorosa. Quando ele estava lidando com meu filho mais novo na pista Jr., ele deu v√°rios socos no meu filho e explicou tudo para ele de uma maneira que ele pudesse entender. Isso foi surpreendente para mim, pois o funcion√°rio era apenas um garoto em idade universit√°ria. Seu nome era Franco. Parab√©ns a voc√™ cara. Andretti n√£o decepcionou.  (Original) I brought my family here and it was a positive experience. My kids are 16, 11 and 6. All of them had a great time and will want to return. One employee in particular really impressed me with how he engaged the kids at to gocarts. He took the time to speak to other children (not part of my group) about the rules of the track and did so in a warm way. When he was dealing with my youngest at the Jr. track he gave my son several fist bumps and explained everything to him in a way that he could understand. This was surprising to me as the employee was only a college age kid himself. His name was Frank. Kudos to you man. Andretti did not disappoint.

topComments.author: Jon Leonard Jr
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Levei minha filha e suas amigas √† Andretti para uma comemora√ß√£o de mini-anivers√°rio. Johnny e Ceara na recep√ß√£o foram muito √∫teis para entender o melhor pacote para as crian√ßas aproveitarem ao m√°ximo o dia.  Eles se divertiram muito com os karts e laser tag e alguns dos passeios ao ar livre. Todos n√≥s paramos no caf√© para tomar uma bebida. Minha esposa e eu passamos o tempo com um pouco de mini-golfe.  Minhas duas queixas s√£o o A/C n√£o funciona neste lugar, e o campo de mini-golfe est√° em ru√≠nas graves.  Mas as crian√ßas se divertiram. E os funcion√°rios foram todos muito prestativos e gentis. Portanto, a avalia√ß√£o permanece positiva e provavelmente voltaremos porque fica nas proximidades.  Mas, por favor, encontre tempo e dinheiro para limpar o minigolfe.  (Original) Took my daughter and her friends to Andretti for a mini-birthday celebration. Johnny and Ceara at the front desk were very helpful in understanding the best package for the kids to get the most out of their day.  They had a blast on the go-karts and laser tag and some of the outdoor rides. We all stopped in the cafe for a drink. My wife and I passed the time with some mini-golf.  My two complaints are the A/C doesn't work at this place, and the mini-golf course is in serious disrepair.  But the kids had fun. And the staff were all very helpful and kind. So the review stays positive and we'll probably go back because it's nearby.  But please find the time and money to clean up the mini-golf.

topComments.author: Joshua Greynolds
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Levei meus dois filhos aqui e nos divertimos muito. A equipe foi muito simp√°tica e prestativa. A √∫nica coisa que eu diria √© comer antes de ir. A comida √© boa, mas n√£o pelo pre√ßo que se paga  (Original) I took my two kids here and we had a blast. The staff was really nice and helpful. The only thing I would say is eat before going. The food is good but not for the price you pay

topComments.author: Lori Ambort
topComments.comment: Amazing new renovations. Updated most attractions. The only thing is my kids to not eat Colombian Harvest Bakery Cafe we are starving and had to leave for lunch. Otherwise amazing staff amazing day thank you so much for the thrill

topComments.author: Mariu E.
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) No caminho de volta para o sul da Fl√≥rida, paramos neste parque e adoramos. Os pre√ßos s√£o razo√°veis, os passeios ao ar livre s√£o √≥timos, especialmente os karts. Nossos filhos n√£o ficaram muito empolgados com os pre√ßos que conseguiram pelos ingressos. Fora isso, foi uma √≥tima parada no caminho para casa. üëç  (Original) On our way back to South Florida we stopped at this park and loved it. Prices are reasonable, outdoor rides are great, specially the go karts. Our kids were not too excited about prices they got for the their  tickets. Other than that this was a great stop on our way home. üëç
